scripts.build: echo Building... && yarn clean && yarn compile && yarn xy lint && yarn xy deplint
scripts.clean: echo Cleaning... && yarn rimraf --glob "dist" && yarn rimraf --glob "packages/*/dist" && yarn rimraf --glob "build" && yarn rimraf --glob "packages/*/build"
scripts.compile: echo Compiling... && yarn workspace @xylabs/ts-scripts-yarn3 package-compile && yarn workspaces foreach -Apt --exclude @xylabs/ts-scripts-yarn3 run package-compile
scripts.npm-logout: yarn npm logout && yarn rimraf ~/.npmrc && unset NPM_TOKEN && yarn config unset npmAuthToken
scripts.deploy-major: yarn workspaces foreach --all version major --deferred && yarn deploy-common
scripts.deploy-minor: yarn workspaces foreach --all version minor --deferred && yarn deploy-common
scripts.deploy-patch: yarn workspaces foreach --all version patch --deferred && yarn deploy-common
